sqlMap.select:
SELECT * FROM ( SELECT A.*, ROWNUM RN FROM ( SELECT PCS.DEPARTBREVITYCODE DEPARTBREVITYCODE, PCS.DEPARTNAME DEPARTNAME, NVL(JJZS.JJZS,'0') JJZS, NVL(YXBJS.YXBJS,'0') YXBJS, NVL(HFS.HFS,'0') HFS FROM (SELECT DEPT.DEPARTCODE, DEPT.DEPARTBREVITYCODE, DEPT.DEPARTNAME, DEPT.NODEORDER FROM T_DEPARTMENT DEPT ,(select t.departfullcode departfullcode from t_department t where t.departcode = #gxdwbm_full#) a WHERE (DEPT.DEPARTLEVEL = #gxdwlevel#
DEPT.DEPARTLEVEL = #gxdwSelfLevel#
) AND DEPT.DEPARTFULLCODE LIKE a.departfullcode || '%' ) PCS,
( SELECT DEPT.DEPARTBREVITYCODE PAICHUSUOBM,COUNT(1) JJZS FROM T_BJXXB BJXX,T_DEPARTMENT DEPT WHERE DEPT.DEPARTLEVEL = #gxdwSelfLevel# AND BJXX.GXDWBM = DEPT.DEPARTCODE AND (BJXX.JQZTDM <> '0' OR BJXX.SFYXBJDM = '0') AND BJXX.BJSJ BETWEEN #bjsj1:TIMESTAMP# AND #bjsj2:TIMESTAMP#
and BJXX.GXDWBM =#gxdwbm_full# GROUP BY DEPT.DEPARTBREVITYCODE
SELECT DEPT.DEPARTBREVITYCODE PAICHUSUOBM,COUNT(1) JJZS FROM T_BJXXB BJXX, T_DEPARTMENT DEPT, (select t.departfullcode departfullcode,t.departbrevitycode departbrevitycode from t_department t where t.departcode = #gxdwbm_full#) a WHERE DEPT.DEPARTLEVEL = #gxdwlevel# AND BJXX.GXDWBM LIKE DEPT.DEPARTBREVITYCODE || '%'
BJXX.GXDWBM like a.departbrevitycode || '%'
AND (BJXX.JQZTDM <> '0' OR BJXX.SFYXBJDM = '0') AND BJXX.BJSJ BETWEEN #bjsj1:TIMESTAMP# AND #bjsj2:TIMESTAMP#
GROUP BY DEPT.DEPARTBREVITYCODE
) JJZS,
(SELECT DEPT.DEPARTBREVITYCODE PAICHUSUOBM,COUNT(1) YXBJS FROM T_BJXXB BJXX,T_DEPARTMENT DEPT WHERE DEPT.DEPARTLEVEL = #gxdwSelfLevel# AND BJXX.GXDWBM = DEPT.DEPARTCODE AND BJXX.SFYXBJDM = '1' AND BJXX.BJSJ BETWEEN #bjsj1:TIMESTAMP# AND #bjsj2:TIMESTAMP#
and BJXX.GXDWBM =#gxdwbm_full# GROUP BY DEPT.DEPARTBREVITYCODE
SELECT DEPT.DEPARTBREVITYCODE PAICHUSUOBM,COUNT(1) YXBJS FROM T_BJXXB BJXX, T_DEPARTMENT DEPT, (select t.departfullcode departfullcode,t.departbrevitycode departbrevitycode from t_department t where t.departcode = #gxdwbm_full#) a WHERE DEPT.DEPARTLEVEL = #gxdwlevel# AND BJXX.GXDWBM LIKE DEPT.DEPARTBREVITYCODE || '%'
BJXX.GXDWBM like a.departbrevitycode || '%'
AND BJXX.SFYXBJDM = '1' AND BJXX.BJSJ BETWEEN #bjsj1:TIMESTAMP# AND #bjsj2:TIMESTAMP#
GROUP BY DEPT.DEPARTBREVITYCODE
) YXBJS,
(SELECT DEPT.DEPARTBREVITYCODE PAICHUSUOBM,COUNT(1) HFS FROM T_BJXXB BJXX,T_DEPARTMENT DEPT WHERE DEPT.DEPARTLEVEL = #gxdwSelfLevel# AND BJXX.GXDWBM = DEPT.DEPARTCODE AND BJXX.JQZTDM = '2' AND BJXX.BJSJ BETWEEN #bjsj1:TIMESTAMP# AND #bjsj2:TIMESTAMP#
and BJXX.GXDWBM =#gxdwbm_full# GROUP BY DEPT.DEPARTBREVITYCODE
SELECT DEPT.DEPARTBREVITYCODE PAICHUSUOBM,COUNT(1) HFS FROM T_BJXXB BJXX, T_DEPARTMENT DEPT, (select t.departfullcode departfullcode,t.departbrevitycode departbrevitycode from t_department t where t.departcode = #gxdwbm_full#) a WHERE DEPT.DEPARTLEVEL = #gxdwlevel# AND BJXX.GXDWBM LIKE DEPT.DEPARTBREVITYCODE || '%'
BJXX.GXDWBM like a.departbrevitycode || '%'
AND BJXX.JQZTDM = '2' AND BJXX.BJSJ BETWEEN #bjsj1:TIMESTAMP# AND #bjsj2:TIMESTAMP#
GROUP BY DEPT.DEPARTBREVITYCODE
) HFS
WHERE PCS.DEPARTBREVITYCODE = JJZS.PAICHUSUOBM(+) AND PCS.DEPARTBREVITYCODE = YXBJS.PAICHUSUOBM(+) AND PCS.DEPARTBREVITYCODE = HFS.PAICHUSUOBM(+) ORDER BY $pageSort$ ) A
WHERE ROWNUM <= #endRow# ) WHERE RN > #beginRow#

SELECT SUBSTR('$gxdwbm$', 0, LENGTH('$gxdwbm$')-1) DEPARTBREVITYCODE, '合计' DEPARTNAME, SUM(NVL(TOTALNUM.JJZS,'0')) JJZS, SUM(NVL(TOTALNUM.YXBJS,'0')) YXBJS, SUM(NVL(TOTALNUM.HFS,'0')) HFS, TO_CHAR(NVL(ROUND((SUM(TOTALNUM.HFS) / SUM(TOTALNUM.YXBJS) * 100), 2), '0'), 'FM999999999990.0099') || '%' HFL FROM ( SELECT PCS.DEPARTBREVITYCODE DEPARTBREVITYCODE, PCS.DEPARTNAME DEPARTNAME, NVL(JJZS.JJZS,'0') JJZS, YXBJS.YXBJS YXBJS, NVL(HFS.HFS,'0') HFS FROM (SELECT DEPT.DEPARTCODE, DEPT.DEPARTBREVITYCODE, DEPT.DEPARTNAME, DEPT.NODEORDER FROM T_DEPARTMENT DEPT WHERE (DEPT.DEPARTLEVEL = #gxdwlevel#
DEPT.DEPARTLEVEL = #gxdwSelfLevel#
) AND DEPT.DEPARTCODE LIKE #gxdwbm# ) PCS,
(SELECT SUBSTR(BJXX.GXDWBM, 0, LENGTH(DEPT.DEPARTBREVITYCODE)) PAICHUSUOBM, COUNT(1) JJZS FROM T_BJXXB BJXX, T_DEPARTMENT DEPT WHERE (DEPT.DEPARTLEVEL = #gxdwlevel#
DEPT.DEPARTLEVEL = #gxdwSelfLevel#
) AND DEPT.DEPARTCODE LIKE #gxdwbm# AND BJXX.GXDWBM LIKE DEPT.DEPARTBREVITYCODE || '%' AND (BJXX.JQZTDM <> '0' OR BJXX.SFYXBJDM = '0') AND BJXX.BJSJ BETWEEN #bjsj1:TIMESTAMP# AND #bjsj2:TIMESTAMP#
GROUP BY SUBSTR(BJXX.GXDWBM, 0, LENGTH(DEPT.DEPARTBREVITYCODE))) JJZS,
(SELECT SUBSTR(BJXX.GXDWBM, 0, LENGTH(DEPT.DEPARTBREVITYCODE)) PAICHUSUOBM, COUNT(1) YXBJS FROM T_BJXXB BJXX, T_DEPARTMENT DEPT WHERE (DEPT.DEPARTLEVEL = #gxdwlevel#
DEPT.DEPARTLEVEL = #gxdwSelfLevel#
) AND DEPT.DEPARTCODE LIKE #gxdwbm# AND BJXX.SFYXBJDM = '1' AND BJXX.BJSJ BETWEEN #bjsj1:TIMESTAMP# AND #bjsj2:TIMESTAMP# AND BJXX.GXDWBM LIKE DEPT.DEPARTBREVITYCODE || '%'
GROUP BY SUBSTR(BJXX.GXDWBM, 0, LENGTH(DEPT.DEPARTBREVITYCODE))) YXBJS,
(SELECT SUBSTR(BJXX.GXDWBM, 0, LENGTH(DEPT.DEPARTBREVITYCODE)) PAICHUSUOBM, COUNT(1) HFS FROM T_BJXXB BJXX, T_DEPARTMENT DEPT WHERE (DEPT.DEPARTLEVEL = #gxdwlevel#
DEPT.DEPARTLEVEL = #gxdwSelfLevel#
) AND DEPT.DEPARTCODE LIKE #gxdwbm# AND BJXX.JQZTDM = '2' AND BJXX.BJSJ BETWEEN #bjsj1:TIMESTAMP# AND #bjsj2:TIMESTAMP# AND BJXX.GXDWBM LIKE DEPT.DEPARTBREVITYCODE || '%'
GROUP BY SUBSTR(BJXX.GXDWBM, 0, LENGTH(DEPT.DEPARTBREVITYCODE))) HFS
WHERE PCS.DEPARTBREVITYCODE = JJZS.PAICHUSUOBM(+) AND PCS.DEPARTBREVITYCODE = YXBJS.PAICHUSUOBM(+) AND PCS.DEPARTBREVITYCODE = HFS.PAICHUSUOBM(+) ) TOTALNUM
